content: this adult sized crochet sun hat is super easy to work up only takes 2 balls of lion brand rewind yarn and is super cute for summer lightweight while offering plenty of coverage for those harsh sun rays june is a closet staple every gal needs pattern is one size fits most this is an easy level crochet pattern and the techniques you will need to know are single_crochet single_crochet increase chain stitch surface slip_stitch and slip_stitch
